TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataListItem extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl implements class System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer, class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer
Public Class DataListItem Inherits WebControl Implements IDataItemContainer
public ref class DataListItem : System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebControl, System::Web::UI::IDataItemContainer

summary.span: 表示 控制項中的項目。

span.span: Represents an item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A物件表示中的項目控制項，例如頁首區段，頁尾區段或資料的項目。A object represents an item in a control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data item. 資料中的項目控制會儲存在可以使用來存取屬性控制項。The data items in the control are stored in a that can be accessed by using the property of the control. 您可以使用以程式設計方式存取的屬性中的項目控制項。You can use a to programmatically access the properties of an item in a control. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用要顯示的內容中的每個資料項目控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use a to display the contents of each data item in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). span.span: Creates a object for the control, which contains the style properties for the control.
A that contains the style properties of the control.

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項中與 物件相關的資料項目。

span.span: Gets or sets a data item associated with the object in the control.

value.span: ，表示 控制項中的資料項目。

span.span: An that represents a data item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定，或判斷屬性與相關聯的資料項目物件存放至控制項。Use the property to specify or determine the properties of a data item associated with the object in the control. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料中的項目控制項。This property only applies to data items in the control. 屬性物件必須設定為其中一個列舉值。The property of the object must be set to one of the enumeration values. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用要顯示之資料項目的內容屬性控制項。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the contents of the data items in the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). summary.span: 從控制項的 集合中，取得 物件的索引。

span.span: Gets the index of the object from the collection of the control.

value.span: 集合中 物件的索引。

span.span: The index of the object from the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷索引數目物件從集合。Use the property to determine the index number of the object from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性只適用於資料中的項目控制項。This property only applies to data items in the control. 屬性物件必須設為`ListItemType.Item`， `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`， `ListItemType.SelectedItem`，或`ListItemType.EditItem`。The property of the object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性顯示的索引編號物件從控制項的集合。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to display the index number of the object from the collection of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see[ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic DataListItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataListItem.ItemIndex Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic DataListItem.ItemIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic DataListItem.ItemIndex Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType ItemType
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property ItemType As ListItemType
public: virtual property System::Web::UI::WebControls::ListItemType ItemType { System::Web::UI::WebControls::ListItemType get(); };

summary.span: 取得項目的類型，這項目為 控制項中的 物件所表示。

span.span: Gets the type of the item represented by the object in the control.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷所表示之項目的型別物件。Use the property to determine the type of the item represented by the object. 下表列出各種項目類型。The following table lists the various item types. |項目類型Item Type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Header`|標題區段控制項。The heading section of the control.| |`Footer`|頁尾區段控制項。The footer section of the control.| |`Item`|中的項目控制項。An item in the control.| |`AlternatingItem`|中的交替項目控制項。An alternating item in the control.| |`SelectedItem`|在選取的項目控制項。The selected item in the control.| |`EditItem`|在 編輯選取的項目控制項。The item selected for editing in the control.| |`Separator`|項目之間的分隔符號控制項。A separator between the items of the control.| |`Pager`|頁面的選取項目區段的控制項。The page selection section of the control.| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷項目所代表的項目類型物件。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the item type of the item represented by the object. 項目中建立的順序項目類型以及顯示控制項。The order that items are created in the control is displayed along with the item type. > [!NOTE] > 下列程式碼範例會使用單一檔案的程式碼模式，而且可能無法正確運作如果直接複製到程式碼後置檔案。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此程式碼範例必須複製到.aspx 副檔名的空白文字檔。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 如需有關 Web Form 程式碼模型的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Form 網頁程式碼模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[DataListItemCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemCreated/CS/datalistitemcreatedcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataListItemCreated#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataListItemCreated/VB/datalistitemcreatedvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示當控制項的 屬性為 時，控制項是否應該將呈現之 HTML 項目的 屬性設為 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本低於4.0，否則。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會指出如何 ASP.NET 應該呈現 HTML 控制項的停用控制項時。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`true`，ASP.NET 會呈現`disabled`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果這個屬性是`false`，ASP.NET 會呈現`class`屬性停用控制項時。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .
